parameters.content:
=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

# 📊 **Commercial Real Estate Weekly Report Automation**

This automation helps you **scrape commercial property listings** (like office and retail spaces) from top websites using **Bright Data**, and automatically stores that data into a **Google Sheet**, ready for reporting or analysis.

---

## 🔹 **SECTION 1: 🔁 Automate + Scrape Listings**

### 🧩 1. 📆 Weekly Market Trigger

**Node Name:** `Weekly Market Trigger`
**What it does:**
This node automatically starts the workflow every week (e.g., Monday at 8 AM). You don't have to press a button — it just runs in the background.

🧠 **Beginner Benefit:**

> Automate your market research without ever missing a week. Set it once and let it run!

---

### 🧩 2. 🌐 Fetch Listings via Bright Data

**Node Name:** `Fetch Listings via Bright Data`
**What it does:**
This node sends a `POST` request to **Bright Data Web Unlocker API**, which is a tool that bypasses captchas, anti-bot systems, and complex JavaScript-loaded pages to give you clean HTML content.

**It targets a URL like:**

```
https://www.loopnet.com/for-lease/office/san-francisco-ca/
```

🛡️ Bright Data ensures the page is accessed as if it's being opened by a real user — no blocks, no errors.

🧠 **Beginner Benefit:**

> Even if a website has bot protections or hidden content, this node ensures you can access the data consistently and safely.

---

## 🔸 **SECTION 2: 🧱 Extract + Save Listings**

### 🧩 3. 🧱 Extract Listing Details (HTML)

**Node Name:** `Extract Listing Details (HTML)`
**What it does:**
It scans the HTML content from the Bright Data response and pulls out important fields like:

* 🏢 Property Title
* 💵 Price
* 📍 Address
* 📐 Size
* 🔗 Link to the listing

Uses **CSS selectors** like `.listing-title` or `.price-info` to find this info.

🧠 **Beginner Benefit:**

> This node turns messy website code into clean, structured data you can actually use in a report or analysis.

---

### 🧩 4. 📊 Save to Google Sheets

**Node Name:** `Save to Google Sheets`
**What it does:**
This final step **appends each extracted listing** into a Google Sheet in real time.

You’ll get a spreadsheet like this:

| Title | Price | Address | Size | URL |
| ----- | ----- | ------- | ---- | --- |

🧠 **Beginner Benefit:**

> Your scraped data is saved instantly where you can filter, chart, or share it with clients or your team.

---

## 🚀 **What You Can Do With This Workflow**

* 📈 Track weekly commercial real estate trends
* 🧠 Compare price per square foot by neighborhood
* 📨 Send reports to clients or investors
* 🔁 Use Google Sheets to trigger visual dashboards

---

## 🎁 Want to Make It Better?

* Add a ✉️ **Slack or Email notification** node at the end
* Use a 🪄 **Markdown Generator** to create beautiful weekly summaries
* Append data to **separate tabs by week** for historical tracking

---

_metadata.name: Automated Property Market Reports with Bright Data & n8n
